normalized_lines: Subscribe to our newsletter for weekly recipes
Grease an 8-inch round pan and heat oven to 350°F.
Whisk flour, cocoa, baking powder, and salt in a medium bowl.
In another bowl, whisk sugar, oil, eggs, milk, zest, and vanilla.
Fold dry ingredients into wet just until no dry streaks remain.
Pour batter into pan and bake 30 to 36 minutes.
Cool 15 minutes in pan, then move to a rack to cool fully.
Storage: keeps 3 days covered at room temperature.
For cleaner slices, chill 20 minutes before cutting.
Nutritional information provided as a courtesy only.

target_recipe.title: Chocolate Orange Olive Oil Cake
steps: Grease an 8-inch round pan and heat oven to 350°F.
Whisk flour, cocoa, baking powder, and salt in a medium bowl.
In another bowl, whisk sugar, oil, eggs, milk, zest, and vanilla.
Fold dry ingredients into wet just until no dry streaks remain.
Pour batter into pan and bake 30 to 36 minutes.
Cool 15 minutes in pan, then move to a rack to cool fully.
notes: Storage: keeps 3 days covered at room temperature.
For cleaner slices, chill 20 minutes before cutting.
